metadata.title: Introduction to Eliassen Professional Services
metadata.overview: Eliassen Group offers four distinct professional services engagement models designed to meet clients where they are in their transformation journey. From talent augmentation to fully managed services, we provide the right level of ownership and expertise to ensure successful outcomes while building your internal capabilities.

email.subject: Exploring Eliassen's Professional Services Capabilities – Tailored Support for Your
email.body:
I wanted to follow up off of my earlier email with a closer look at our **Technology Solutions practices**, which are designed to help organizations like yours **accelerate innovation, reduce risk, and scale efficiently**.

Our Technology Solutions team delivers **practitioner-led expertise** across five integrated areas:

**• Application Development & Integration** – Cloud-native, mobile, modernization, UI/UX, testing & QA, and enterprise architecture.
**• Cybersecurity** – Risk assessment, zero trust architecture, identity management, network/data protection, monitoring, and resiliency planning.
**• AI & Data Services** – GenAI, architecture & engineering, integration & transformation, modernization, BI & visualization.
**• Infrastructure & Cloud** – Infrastructure engineering, FinOps, DevOps, and cloud architecture.
**• Enterprise Agility & Program Management** – Agile delivery & coaching, product/project/program management, OKRs, lean portfolio management, and value stream management

What sets us apart is our ability to **blend strategy with execution**—whether through individual consultants, managed teams, or fully outsourced engagements.

Would you be open to a quick conversation to explore how our technology capabilities might support your current initiatives?

key_message: We offer four different engagement approaches, from providing skilled talent you manage to taking complete ownership of projects and outcomes.
The key is matching the right model to your specific situation, timeline, and internal capabilities.
evidence_point: We recently helped a manufacturing company implement a new ERP system using our managed project approach.
They got a working system in 20 weeks with full knowledge transfer, compared to their previous vendor's 18-month timeline that stalled after a year.
engagement_question: Which of these areas—cloud, AI, cybersecurity, or agile delivery—are currently top of mind for your team?
Are you facing any challenges with scaling your tech stack or modernizing legacy systems?
Do you have any initiatives underway that could benefit from external support or specialized expertise?
voicemail: Hi [Prospect Name], this is [Your Name] with Eliassen Group.

I wanted to follow up on our previous conversation and share a quick note about our Technology Solutions practice. We help organizations accelerate innovation and scale efficiently across areas like cloud, cybersecurity, AI, and agile delivery.
If you're open to a quick chat, I'd love to explore how we might support your current initiatives.
You can reach me at [Your Phone Number]. Looking forward to connecting!

linkedin.connection_request: I help technology leaders select the optimal engagement model for their initiatives. Would enjoy connecting to share insights on service delivery approaches.
linkedin.inmessage_body:
I wanted to reach out and share a bit about Eliassen Group's Technology Solutions practices. We help organizations accelerate innovation and scale efficiently across areas like cloud modernization, cybersecurity, AI/data services, and agile delivery.

Our teams bring practitioner-led expertise and flexible delivery models—whether you need strategic consulting, managed teams, or full outsourcing.

If you're exploring new initiatives or facing challenges in these areas, I'd welcome a quick conversation to see how we might support your goals.

Thanks for considering, and I hope we can connect!

objections.objection: We prefer to maintain control over our projects and don't want to outsource ownership.
objections.response: That's exactly why we offer talent services and managed team models. You maintain full control and decision-making authority while gaining access to specialized expertise. Many clients start there and evolve to other models as trust builds.

objections.objection: We've had bad experiences with consulting firms over-promising and under-delivering.
objections.response: That's unfortunately common with firms that use a one-size-fits-all approach. Our strength is honestly assessing your situation and recommending the engagement model that matches your capacity and constraints. We'd rather recommend a smaller, successful engagement than over-promise.

objections.objection: We're not sure we have the budget for comprehensive professional services.
objections.response: Our engagement models are designed to be cost-effective at different budget levels. Talent services can be very economical for specific expertise gaps, while managed projects often deliver better ROI than traditional approaches. We can discuss options that fit your budget constraints.

objections.objection: We need services that can scale up and down based on project phases.
objections.response: That's precisely why we offer multiple engagement models that can transition based on your needs. Many clients start with managed projects for rapid delivery, then shift to talent services for ongoing support. This flexibility is a core part of our approach.

objections.objection: We're concerned about knowledge transfer and avoiding vendor lock-in.
objections.response: Knowledge transfer is built into every engagement model we offer. Our goal is always to build your internal capabilities, not create dependency. We measure success partly by how well your team can sustain the solution after our engagement ends.

collateral.title: Professional Services Engagement Models: Choosing the Right Approach for Technology Success
